// Pivot 0, 0
int flippers[16] = {
	4, 1,
	9, 0,
	45, 22,
	46, 26,
	41, 25,
	4, 11,
	1, 6,
	3, 3
};

// Pivot 0.000000, 0.000000
float flippers[16] = {
	0.083333f, 0.033333f,
	0.187500f, 0.000000f,
	0.937500f, 0.733333f,
	0.958333f, 0.866667f,
	0.854167f, 0.833333f,
	0.083333f, 0.366667f,
	0.020833f, 0.200000f,
	0.062500f, 0.100000f
};
